title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Intelligent Outage Management Using Automated Reasoning and AI (AIM275)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用自动推理和人工智能的智能故障管理 (AIM275)
abstract: Learn how automated verification techniques are transforming outage management. This solution reduces response times by delivering accurate, real-time ETA updates for customer service tickets while validating AI-generated outage classifications to ensure reliability. It incorporates standardized protocols aligned with regulatory guidelines and maintains compliance with NERC and FERC requirements. The result: faster, more consistent, and trustworthy outage resolution that enhances both customer experience and operational efficiency. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解自动化验证技术如何变革停电管理。该解决方案通过为客户服务工单提供准确的实时预计到达时间更新来缩短响应时间，同时验证AI生成的停电分类以确保可靠性。它采用符合监管指导原则的标准化协议，并保持符合NERC和FERC要求。结果是：更快速、更一致、更可信赖的停电解决方案，提升客户体验和运营效率。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。
